thread.section_title: Quality Logo Products, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quality Logo Products, Inc. | qualitylogoproducts.com
thread.title: Ricky
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Ricky

author: Ricky
title: Ricky
text: After a lot of research I found that Quality Logo Products gave us the best price by a long shot for an order of Bic Tri-Stic pens. What was even better was the quality of the pen was on par with any other company. Customer service was good, they kept me well informed and got the order of 3000 custom printed pens to us in a timely manner. Thank you!! Shout out to Kelly.
